reviewText: This was a great movie! I loved it. It also brought me to tears several times.

Say That You Love Me- Philippines Filipino Tagalog DVD Movie I'm a US-born Caucasian who may have been a Filipino in his previous life. I watched this film when it first came out in the Philippines. By the third viewing, I could anticipate every word of the dialog, start to finish. I'm happy to now have it permanently in my possession as a DVD. Thanks Amazon for making this available.
